original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3211)@</color>向前方丟出一顆不穩定的混沌法珠，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(3211)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對敵人造成法術傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3211)@</color> Throw an unstable Chaos Orb towards the front, with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(3211)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> causes spell damage to the enemy.
